input.rewritten_query: 查询22级计科一班男生人数

sql_result.sql: WITH base AS (SELECT student.id FROM student JOIN class ON student.class_id = class.id WHERE class.grade_year = 2022 AND class.class_name = '计科一班' AND student.gender = '男' AND student.is_deleted = 0 AND class.is_deleted = 0) SELECT COUNT(*) AS student_count FROM base

entity_mappings.reason: 根据字段描述“年级/入学年份（如 2022 级）”及常见问法“22级”映射为数值 2022
根据字段描述“班级名称，班级实体映射主字段”直接精确匹配
根据字段描述“性别（男/女等）”映射为标准值 '男'

sql_validate_result.executed_sql: WITH base AS (SELECT student.id FROM student JOIN class ON student.class_id = class.id WHERE class.grade_year = 2022 AND class.class_name = '计科一班' AND student.gender = '男' AND student.is_deleted = 0 AND class.is_deleted = 0) SELECT COUNT(*) AS student_count FROM base

probe_samples.probe_sql: SELECT DISTINCT class.grade_year AS value FROM class WHERE class.grade_year IS NOT NULL AND class.is_deleted = 0 LIMIT 20
SELECT DISTINCT class.class_name AS value FROM class WHERE class.class_name IS NOT NULL AND class.is_deleted = 0 LIMIT 20
